# isPositive() function
<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@esdmr/assert](./esdmr.assert.md) &gt; [isPositive](./esdmr.assert.ispositive.md)


Asserts that the given value is positive. Negative zero is considered positive.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isPositive(value: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | number | Value to assert. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
